content.detailedDescription: Standing under a tree at a car show, i noticed a white light filling most of the spaces in a tree above me(1). as it passed the tree into view it was a large square appearing 2 dimensional above the lit parking lot. it was divided into 4 sections by a thin partition seeming non luminescent like a window frame(2). the object glowed like an x-ray viewing board.  because it appeared 2 dimensional its size was not immediately apparent, however it was on a steady heading at a steady speed(3). its course was heading from oxford to trumbull along route 111. at this time it was apparently 4 to 5 times the tree level and the area of a two football fields traveling between 50 and 100mph. i was still able to see it as it diminished to a dot on the horizon(4). until now i have had no place worth reporting this incident too, aside from a few classified add looking for others who saw it. i do believe in mufon's purpose after having viewed the sight and i hope this report can fill in a blank somewhere.
content.summary: Square, white luminescent, divided like window

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in my bed onr night looking out of my window when i saw a star moving very quickly on a straight path. i thought it was a satteilite until it suddenly made a 180 degree turn. it started flying around crazily for about 2 minutes until it flew away from the "m" painted on the mountain nearest to my house. it flew toward my house and got larger until it suddenly plummeted downward and then straight up.  it then got smaller and disapearred. that was the first time it happened. it has happened around here erratically since then. it was weird knowing that i might be seeing a ufo.
content.summary: Star like ufo moving around in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo, visto aproximadamente a las 9:40 am, y viajaba a una velocidad aproximadamente de 7000 km por hora en direccion noroeste a una altura aproximada de 25km  tomando en cuenta que un avion tipo boeing comercial pasaba detras de el a una velocidad muy inferior a la del objeto actualmente descrito el tama���o aproximado era de 200 metros y era delgado, lo que me hizo pensar que es un ovni es la gran velocidad que llevava, nota: vivo en el salvador, centro america y aqui no es comun ver un objeto que viaje a esa velocidad teniendo en cuenta que haya sido un avion tipo militar de la fuerza armada de eeuu, lo cual no considero probable por la gran velocidad.
muchas gracias (mensaje en espa���ol.)
content.summary: Viajaba a una velocidad aproximada de 7000 km/hr direccion

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was in my truck turning onto crispin street from willits road in the holmesburg section of ne philly.

2.  i always take note of any helicopters in the sky to see if they are police, news, etc.

3.  i knew it was a black helicopter.

4.  it was a black helicopter speeding real fast in the sky in a sw direction towards center city/downtown philly.

5.  i was excited to see a black helicopter in the sy in broad daylight.

6.  the black helicopter flew away over the horizon very fast.

i am a mufon field investigator in ne philly so if anyone else saw this, please contact me @ cripplers08@aol.Com or mufon12347@yahoo.Com because i would really like to talk to you about this.

my 16 year old son just told me that he always sees black helicopters with no markings around here in the sky.  what the heck is up???
content.summary: I saw a black helicopter speeding sw in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting my experiences having noticed the heightened awareness of ufo���s, i.E. the history channel.  therefore, i am submitting these events purely for the sake of your collection of data. i apologize for putting three stories into this one report, but i'd just rather do it that way. i hope it's ok.

experience 1 of 3
it was in 1967. i was 12 years old living on a farm in kansas.  i was on the second floor in my bed about midnight or after, not sure.  i awoke to see flashing lights, like an ambulance, coming across the corn field hovering just above the corn. it came into the farm yard and hovered making all sorts of loud noises like sirens.  a bright light lit up everywhere and that was the last i remembered till the next morning when i ask everyone at breakfast, ���what was that big light and all those sirens?��� nobody new what i was talking about and it was accounted to a dream.  of course to me i felt i was not dreaming at all, however, it did stop after the bright light peaked. so i concluded maybe it was a dream, but really didn���t buy it.  i let it go nonetheless. 

the interesting thing about this experience is what happened 25 years later. for some reason it started to bug me that i never resolved that experience i had at 12.  i had insurance and wondered if i could get hypnotherapy  to recall what really happened.  to my surprised i was able to see a license hypno-therapist.  it became legit because the therapist said it was most likely some trauma that caused the experience and i suppressed it to this particular memory. 

he put me under hypnosis and regressed me back to that night.  i recalled the story as it unfolded while in my regressed state.  the story was very similar to the memory i had except that i was able to see more of what happened in the farm yard.  i was up out of bed and looking out the window.   i saw two lights whirl around in a gyroscope fashion.  they kept doubling until there was nothing but a ball of light and then the white out happened.  when the session was over i ask the doctor what he thought about it. he said, ���i have no idea, perhaps a dream (?), but i don���t really no for sure.��� he did say there was no sign of trauma.

one further note, after this session i found i had a very difficult time talking about it. i even wondered if the doctor, while having me under, put a notion in me to not talk about it.  because every time i tried, i���d wind up saying, ���forget it, i can���t talk about it.���  i would even get like a lump in my throat and words just wouldn���t come out.  that was 14 years ago, it���s only been in the last 5 years or so i���ve been able to discuss it as before. 

experience 2
in 1975 i was traveling with a friend in my car returning home from a day trip.  we were just coming to the west end of our town.  we both saw at the same time a green object with a sort of florescent light with a red light on the bottom. it zoomed across the sky going at least several thousand mile per hour.  it went across the eastern sky, about the altitude of a jet, at about 45 degrees in about 2 seconds.  it left a green florescent trail behind it that faded quickly but stretched pretty far.  i stopped immediately in the middle of the highway (two lane road really, hwy 56 in kansas).  we got out and could see nothing.  both of saw and described the exact same thing.

experience 3
this was january 1, 1997.  i was backpacking in the mark twain forest of missouri.  it was about 11pm.  i was sitting on a rock in the middle of a clearing watching the sky and saw 4 lights.  if they had been motionless they would not have been detected because they looked exactly like just another group of stars.  they formed a perfect box shape at first. they moved exactly together.  making squares, diagonals, all sorts of movements in all directions and most of the time staying in this box formation, but varying it a little. i watched this for about ten minutes, same thing over and over. they were very clearly there.  then all at once they stopped and about a half a second later, they broke formation and all spun out in weird spiraling ways in the opposite direction until they were gone out of sight which only took about another half a second.
content.summary: Lights like a ambulance

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine who i work with took a picture of his son standing at the edge of some rocks. he did not notice the object when he took the picture. when they got home and downloaded them that is when he noticed the object in the background. he showed me the picture and i told him he should report it. he didnt want to but said he wouldn't mind if i reported it.
he doesnt want to reveal his name.
content.summary: Picture taken of son standing on the edge of the grand canyon

content.detailedDescription: July 24 2008 my family and i were sitting outside  about 10:10pm. up in the sky we seen this bright  orange ball at first we thought it was a plane on fire.  the more we looked at it, it was round and right over the tree line in the cloud.  in a second it was gone, a few mins later it appeared to be  at a different spot then gone again.  about 10 mins later we seen 3 round balls in the sky really  bright orange it stay for a few min then gone.  this was something !
content.summary: 3 bright orange light

content.detailedDescription:
I was preparing to go to bed after watching tv. it was a clear night and i looked out of my window up to the sky as is my habit. it was a clear night and i live in a rural area so there is little light pollution. 

i saw a star-like object moving across the sky in a south-easterly direction. its trajectory was a flattish curve. i estimate its altitude to be about 20,000 feet but i could not say how big it was. it shone blue/brilliant white. it was certainly not a satellite as it was far too low and it was not a meteor as it did not have a tail, nor did it "flash" as a meteor does in the atmosphere. it was not a jet. 

the object was silent and appeared to be moving fast. i went outside and watched it as it went away from me towards the low moon and was soon lost against the background of it. 

i can best describe it thus: it was as if the planet venus, as we see it from earth, had detatched itself from the heavens and flown off into the void. 

hope this is useful to you.

best wishes,

mark
content.summary: Silver-blue star-like object

content.detailedDescription: I���m an american expat living in paris, france. i���m married and we���ve lived in paris for several years. we live on the 4th floor in a classical french building. there are other apartment buildings across the courtyard from ours. but the building directly across ours is approximately two floors shorter. the day before yesterday, july 23, 2008, was a clear day. at about 7:00 pm, i was in the kitchen and standing over the stove making dinner. the stove is right next to a large kitchen window. from my kitchen window i have an unobstructed view of the horizon. while i was cooking i happened to glance out the window, and i saw two oval shapes moving silently across the sky. they were silvery with a bluish glow and completely silent. they flew slowly at a low altitude ��� much lower than a plane ��� and maintained a formation, flying side by side the entire time. i watched them for a couple of minutes. then my husband came into the kitchen and drew my attention away from the window. i was afraid to tell him what i���d just seen and that it was still outside our window. i don���t know why. i knew they were ufos. but i guess i couldn���t believe it myself. when he walked out of the kitchen i turned back to the window and i could still see them. they were some distance away now and were still side by side as they slowly headed west. i watched them a little longer. by then it had gotten darker. i felt so strange. i finished cooking, walked out of the kitchen and served dinner in our dining area. i finally did tell my husband about it but i���m not sure he believes me. i���m still trying to make sense of it myself. i know what i saw. but i don���t know what to do, if anything. i���m reporting it because maybe someone else who lives in my area saw them and also reported it.
content.summary: Two ufos fly past kitchen window

content.detailedDescription: I was arriving home at ecactly 10:20pm est last night at my home on the edge of town lafayette indiana.  my home is located right off us hwy 26 headed towards rossville in.  i wasn't even looking at the sky--was paying attention to the road and very noticably were 3 large bright orange spheres.  i said "here we go again"--it was the same as i reported to mufon last year.  3 large balls of orange/yellow color, followed by a plane like noise (fairly loud)--and then nothingness---then separately very far apart--like opposite areas of your vision you see very very small white flashing lights.  last time someone posted saying that it is a refueling exercise at grisson airforce base in peru indiana--and i could believe that however the speed that they disappear and reappear is like nothing i have ever seen with even military aircraft.
content.summary: This sighting is the exact same as i posted about last year.  small tiny little flashing white lights going all ove the sky--then meeting up and flashing bright orange glow very large very bright followed by audible sound.--then very far apart suddenly.

content.detailedDescription:
it was told to me by some of my extended family of a sighting that happened somewhere in the late 70 to early 80 period in roane county west virginia.  this man told me that himself and 4 other guys were working in the oilfields here and they were out on a right of way. the men were taking lunch, they were all sitting there eating and out around the hill coming towards them they spotted a cyllindical shaped metallic silver object. he told me that it passed over them at approx 50 to 80 feet off the deck and noticed a slight humming noise as it passed over. he said it then continued followng the r.O.W. out around the hill, the men jumped off the truck and chased it on foot but here the terrain is pretty toughand they couldnt keep up. they said it was at a constant speed about 20 to 30 mph, it never slowed down, nor wavered on its course and eventually went out of sight and they never saw it again. i fully believe this as i have never really known him to lie and have known him most of my adult life.I am 44


        scott carper
        253 spice ridge rd
         newton,wva 25266
        304 565 7031

      in have a couple other sightings if u r interested. i am also interested in doing some field research for mufon in wv if they have a chapter here because there r stories here that you would probaly be interested in. i have followed the ufo phenemenon all my life and i believe they are out there. thank you.
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: It was a light cloudy night just before 3am or rite at 3am a green orb fell at the rate of a free falling basketball but from the sky. object was many miles away. i estimate the object was at least a half mile in diameter much larger than an asteroid or far off aircraft. this object was hidden by a thin layer of grey clouds but glowed thru the clouds there was no trail behind the falling object. this object was green in color uniformely round and had a lighter green ring around it much like a force field seen in science fiction movies. the clouds acted as a filter so i could not see the details in the green object but just the light and it appeared perfectly spherical with a fainter outter green ring like that of a shield. i was actually waiting for something to explode after it fell below the tree's on the horizon.
content.summary: Green orb fell like a basketball from the sky appeared to be green.

content.detailedDescription:
I got a skyquest dossonian xt-6 telescope for my birthday so my cousin and i took it out to the middle of the country to do some night star and planet viewing.  it was approximately 9:00pm when we left ottawa.  we started going north on rt.23 and turned left onto to rt.52 towards mendota from ottawa.  we found a gravel farm road (think it was either 15 or 16) and turned north towards earlville.  halfway between ottawa and earlville there is an area that is great for viewing the night sky because it is very dark (no town lights).  we stopped the truck, got out, set up the telescope and started looking around for stars and planets to view.  we looked at the moon for awhile on a high resolution lens.  then we looked at jupiter for awhile.  we found saturn and looked at that for awhile as well.  about 45 mins later we changed lenses.  we went from the high powered lens to the low powered lens to see the difference between the two when looking at the moon, jupiter and saturn.

i started looking at saturn which was w of where we were when my cousin noticed a large group of weird white lights falling in the sky.  (i confirmed later the next day that these lights were in fact our local sky dive chicago divers group performing a night jump called the "ufo jump".  the divers had worn white flares on their outfits.  there were two series of jumps that night, both with the white flares.) when i turned to look at the lights a different, stationary set of dirty orange colored lights, much higher in the sky than the falling white lights, caught my eye.  jupiter was se of where we were standing and it was positioned about 50 degrees above of the horizon.  just underneath (about 10 degrees below jupiter) and to the left of jupiter there were 2 dirty orange colored glowing orb-like lights.  (see lights1.Jpg) they were situated one above the other with a bit of room in between.  they didn't move, they just seemed to hover.  i pointed them out to my cousin who agreed that what i was seeing couldn't be the same as the falling lights.  i spun my telescope around to see if i could see what they were, lined up my site to the top "orb" then looked through the eye piece.  what i saw was a bright red light where the "orb" was, spaced evenly behind the red light yet a little to the side on top and bottom were two much smaller white lights.  then spaced evenly behind the white lights in alignment with them were two more white lights (one on top one on bottom).  in straight alignment with the red light but behind the two white lights was another small white light. (see lights2.Jpg)  i saw this for approximately just a few seconds and it disappeared from my scope sight.  i looked back up into the air and both lights were completely gone.

at that point my cousin pointed directly left of where the lights were just at and we saw one single dirty orange orb.  it hovered in one spot for approximately 5-10 seconds then started to move to the left.  it stopped and looked like it was hovering and rocking back and forth from side to side.  then it slowly moved back to the right..Back to where we just saw it moments ago.  it sat there for about 5 seconds.  then it began to flicker white, red, blue, all different colors.  then it turned extremely bright red, started to move to the right again slowly..Picked up speed and took off south towards ottawa.  it disappeared from view within a matter of 2 or 3 seconds.

after seeing that we were watching the sky looking for the orb to come back into view.  about 10-15 minutes later we were looking east, about 20 degrees above the horizon and saw what appeared to be the orb again.  it appeared to be moving south, only this time it would move then stop, move then stop, move then stop.  it did this for about 2 minutes then just disappeared.  there were no color changes this time and we did not see it move away from us when it disappeared, it just simply blinked out of existence.

we kept watching the sky for about an hour or so after this and never saw it again.  we saw the normal air traffic of jets and some planes here and there but didn't see the weird dirty orange orbs again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two sightings of similar orb(s) with & w/o a telescope in same night.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work this evening on the i-190 heading north into buffalo, ny.  as i passed the hamburg street exit (exit 5), i noticed a peculiar light arrangement to my right approximately 1.5~2 miles away.  the lights were in a vertical alignment, like what you would see if a commercial jet banked 90-degrees.   at the very top was a pulsating white light (not flashing).  below that were two blue lights.  much further below (50 to 100 feet) the blue lights was a single red light. as i followed it moving away, it seemed to be a shape like a vertical cigar.

it caught my attention and i tried to keep it in view.  i but it disappeared behind some taller buildings in the city to the north.  i then drove around another mile to the church street exit (exit 7).  while exiting the thruway, i saw the same light pattern over my left shoulder.  this time, it was much larger and the light pattern was now 30-degrees from horizontal.  the craft was heading southeast towards lake erie and was travelling without making any detectable noise.  if it were a commercial jet, it would definitely have been very audible at the low altitude it appeared to be flying.

the exit i was on is off of an elevated section of the thruway so i quickly descended to a point where my view of the craft was blocked by the thruway. i raced to get to a location where i would have a clear view over lake erie.  i reached an opening about 20-seconds later, but to my dismay, the craft could not be found.

in the close up view (2nd sighting), the red light was bright and not flashing.  the blue lights now appeared to be more of a blue glow like from some type of propulsion system.  i would compare it to the blue lights on the rear of the starship destroyer in the movie star wars. the white light was now on the far right side of the craft.
content.summary: Strange low altitude cigar/rectangle shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were out on our rear deck sitting, having coffee and from the north a small helocopter was heard.  i turned to visually locate the chopper's sound in the very clear sky. as i identified the craft as a small chopper heading directly south, i noticed a pill sized(about a third the size of your out-stretched thumbnail) cloud colored object.  i observed the object quickly descend either above or behind the chopper.   [i wish i could be more specific of the object's altitude, but having no idea of the ufo's size, this was puzzling.   the chopper was about 2000 feet above us.]  the object leveled out heading directly east, away from the chopper.  i tried to point out the object to my wife but she never caught sight of the small oject, i suspect of the size. it maintained attitude and after 1 minutes of linear flight seemed to ascend, in an eyeblink, out of sight.  the chopper was well out of sight by now, but still heard.  went to the kitchen clock to check time--3:21p.M.. 
     i was hallucinating or saw a atmospheric phenomenon or a small cloud gone wild or your guess is as good as mine.  wow!!!!!!!!!!  maybe the coffee.
content.summary: Dropped above small helocopter leveled out and ascended east

content.detailedDescription:
I was stationed in the clay butte firetower in the northernmost shoshone national forest in the summer of 1983. this was just north of the scenic highway 212 several miles east of a montana town. 
a mailed in report came from a mr. dolese from his wyoming vacation apparently.  mr. dolese said he was from alaska. my supervisor forwarded it to me and i told him about its contents afterwards. 
dolese said he saw an object of unknown type very near the firetower.  he said it was in the early morning hours and wondered what it was. he said he thought that i, as a trained observer, would know.
i did not see it or know of it. 
i responded to mr. dolese's letter to this. i thought that would be the end of it, and that he would have his laugh. he wrote back, to his credit and my surprise, insisting that he had seen this... thing. it was different enough to have disturbed him i guess.
my supervisor took note of it, also finding it of some interest, but noted little else if i recall correctly. he gave no indication that it was something that had happened before.
i do not know what it could have been, but it did not wake me, and therefore i suggest it must have been quiet indeed. i still think of this on occasion all these years later, but have no furthur information from the incident. i have never seen a ufo to my knowledge to this day. but i do think that this man did believe that he saw something strange at that time and i feel it justifies a report even now.  brian
content.summary: Ufo near fire lookout tower ,1983

content.detailedDescription:
At about 11:30pm i saw something unexplained in the southern sky.  i watched it as it humg motionless about 35% or so above the horizon.  an unidentified motionless object.  it was, by far, the brightes object in the sky and like nothing i had ever seen before. i had no idea.  i figured...Mufon, so i googled it, found james bouck the state director in schenectady, ny and called him.  i told him to look in the southern sky and that if it was still there in 10 minutes i'd call him back. so i went back outside and, sure enough, it was still there.  

i called him back.  he wasn't able to see it, but we go to talking and he suggested that i fill out this form.

after our conversation i went outside, but the object had moved somewhat toward the southwest.  i wondered if maybe this wasn't something identifiable like the space station or something.  

in any event, it looked like the planet venus in the morning, except three or four of them fused one atop the other as a single object and hanging motionless in the night sky about 35 or so degrees above the horizon.  the brightest thing, by far, in the sky. i'm not certain i would call it cylindrical, mnore like a "rod" of light that seemed to have thin, crooked "arms" of light attatched to it.  i kept looking at stars to reassure myself that this was something entirely different.

i am out near every night looking up at the stars, a skywatcher for at least the past 50 years and i've never seen anything like that.  tonight  is a clear sky with the milky way faintly visible and this thing was unprecedented. so much so that i am filling out this report.  

over the course of the past hour as the earth has rotated, the object's apparent position has changed toward the southwest by at least the width of a full moon. so, there may well be a mundane explanation for this thing that happens to be in tonight's sky.  but i don't know what it is.
content.summary: Stationary  bright object

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son were walking the dogs this evening, as we were returning,walking through a feild behind our house, i noticed a very large array of lights, i asked my son "what the heck is that" the lights were to the west, and looked like a giant ring with about 5 diamonds on it, and then poof it was lights out. when the lights went out on this object you could still see an outline of the large stationary vehical? about 5 seconds later another smaller light appeared above the object, and disappeared.The night was very clear, as i noticed alot of air traffic above the seen object (maybe 4-5 planes). i waited and watched another 5 min with no more lights. my first thought was it was some military exercise, but i have seen flares before , and this was not flares.
content.summary: Ufo seen in central indiana

content.detailedDescription:
I would appreciate a response back with any relevant info, other similar sightings, contact info, etc. this is important to me. 

my friend and i were out at dove springs it���s an ohv park designed for off highway vehicles near edwards afb in mojave ca off the 14. can���t recall the date but either fall or spring of 06. i do know mars was visible. we just got back from a long ride as the sun set, i had set up a spotlight i had just gotten (15 million candle watts ) and aimed it in the sky. with all the dust flying around you could see the beam of light, it looked something like the luxor light. about 40 minutes after we got back my friend had said that mars was out and we were searching the sky. out there in the desert it is truly amazing the amount of stars that are visible. he found mars and it was like an off red orange color. we were still looking at the stars and i saw a star that was red red and i pointed it out saying that it was probably mars. we were comparing them and he had told me that his was mars (from location) and he was unsure what the other red star was. i thought he was wrong because of the strong color difference and told him that his star was orange and mine was red. these were somewhat opposite of each other as we had to turn to look between the stars. he once again assured me that his star was mars and as we turned and were looking at the predominantly red star it moved slightly and before i could finish the word (satellite) in this sentence ��� oh, i think it���s a satellite��� . boom, this massive airship appears now totally guessing here 1000 feet away and 1000 ft above the ground. completely silent, no approach, we were staring right at it and it just appeared. the first visual was the side view. truly amazing, probably 15 to 30 stories tall and the length of a football field (no joke). it wasn���t hard to process what i was looking at but was blown away of the size, massiveness of this craft. it appeared to be black with thousands of lights on the side, very organized rows. the lights actually appeared to be windows, imagine a huge apartment building on its side flying in the sky. there were no wings. it was moving at about 100-150 mph and then we got to see the back of the craft. the rear of the craft was 3 massive red lights. they covered the entire back of the craft, from top to bottom, side to side. you could probably put 7 airplanes in just one of these lights. they did not blink at the same time they would alternate in a steady pace, they were bright red blinking one at a time. during this we were talking to each other, freaking out discussing how this thing just appeared in front of us, the size of it, no wings, the 3 massive lights on the back and we started to run through the desert after it. it was off in the distance now just slowly cruising away but the 3 red alternating lights still very visible and then all the sudden this bright white light detaches and goes shooting out of the side visible to us , and flew across the sky( extremely fast, some sort of plane). the size difference was incredible 1/1000 of this craft. about 3 minutes later we hear jets screaming through the sky about 6-8 fighter planes flying one after the other looking for this craft, they were loud, afterburners on and searching. this thing was huge, i live 5 blocks away from an airport in los angeles and see planes all day all night. that is exactly what i saw, that red star we were looking at had teleported in a split second to being right in front of us, no wings, dead silent, bigger that a football field, hundreds of windows , 3 massive red lights, a ship detach and the military searching. this is exactly what i saw but i can���t draw to well. i thought it was rectangular and my friend thought it was triangular.


please respond with any info. distance may be closer.
content.summary: Saw craft appear from nowhere, football field size, detached pod, silent, 3 massive red alternating lights on back, air force scrambled

content.detailedDescription: My father took pictures of a ufo event while at the lake. these pictures were taken over lake winnipeg near gimli mb (willow island) these objects were in the sky hovering for approx 5 minutes then dissappeared. the pictures were taken with an 8 mega pixel camera and have amazing detail.
content.summary: Nighttime orb shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Was in the back yard with my dog siting in a chair in the shade i pick up my juice bottle to drink and looked up in the sky i could it as plain as day...I thought it was a balloon then a plane the lights were big and it was a triangle shape slowlying spining then i heard a plane in the distance then it became silent...Then it started it manuver strangely slowly spinning i could see the 2 lights 1 red 1 green like orbs and behind it a triangle dark thing the more i looked at it the more and more i did not reconize the shape(plane, weather, balloon.Or other wise it seem to move up towards the sky slowly spining i think clock wise i could not move i wanted to get my cell phone to take a pic but i just didnt want to leave..I watched 12min till it faded still frist red the green then at the very end before it faded into the sky it winked out and could see a black orb in the sky and that was it 30 minutes later i could see and hear planes again my dog got sick and threw up a few times he doesnt feel well..Nor do i....Like i said my brain couldnt come up with or reconize what it was.But i know it wasnt balloons or a plane ect..The color was beyond bright like stars.Remembering more...As it started to climb it kinda looked like planets in the eveing sky.It didnt manuver like anything i ever saw...I stood there paralized i felt helpless no was around. for me to say i have neighbors on all sides.I was just staring in amazment i'm still shaking its 6:10pm my dog is really quite layin next to me..When i saw it fade and wink out i felt as i was pulled away..Like a��� magnet.
content.summary: Triangle shape with 1red and 1 green light taking turns winking as it spun slowly as it hoverd across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on southwest flight 371 coming from indiana for a landing at dia. about 20 minutes from landing, the seatbelt sigh was on, i looked out the window(i had a window seat on the port side-last row) and saw a circular shadow traveling with the aircraft at the same rate of speed.  i have seen shadows from aircraft before and this was like the others in color and density. it appeared to be about 100-200 yeards from the airacraft.  after observing it for about 5 minutes the port wing of the plane wend up about 40 degrees and the 737 made a sharp turn to the starbord and then into an e-w runway for a landing.  as the wing went up and the plane banked to the right i observed the shadow to continue on a straight line that we would have taken if we had not banked.  it continued on at the same rate of speed as before.  at that time of day, the sun was in the east about 35 degrees off the horizon.  therefore any shadow from our plane would have been in front to the 737 and not visible from the cabin. whatever made this shadow would have to be above us and to the rear at our rate of speed(225 kts?).  i know of no aircraft or aboral creature that makes a circular shadow.  what ever it was, was airborne. i saw no other objects on the ground and there were no roads or trails along the flight path. when i first saw the object, my first reaction was it was flight 371.  but it did not have the shadow of an aircraft.  the shadow never varied in flight path or speed during the whole time i observed it.
content.summary: A round shadow  45 degrees off port side of 737 going on the ground.

content.detailedDescription: While visiting family in indiana, we were traveling northbound on howe rd in hamilton county aprox. one-half mile south of indiana sr 238 at aprox. 1015 - 1030 on the evening of july 23 2008.  just off to the west of our vehicle we observed two bright orange lights that just "poped" on at the same time one on top of the other seperated by a distance of 10 to 15 feet.  these two lights stayed on for 3 to 5 seconds then went off.  the objest remained stationary with no movement at all during illumination.  when they went off i could not see any type of navigation or anti-collision lighting just darkness.  when the first set of lights went off, aprox. 1000 to 2000 feet to the west two more orange bright lights came on.  these two were the same discription as the first two.  they stayed on for aprox. 3-5 seconds and went off.  again, no navigation or anti-collision light were observed after the lights went off just darkness.  i work and live in florida around air force bases i am used to seeing all types of aircraft and aircraft flares.  these were not flares, and the brightness  was brighter than any aircraft landing light i have ever observed.
content.summary: Two bright orange lights one on top of the other, brighter than any star or aircraft landing light

content.detailedDescription:
In my grandfather's house (with old, ripply glass in the windows,) i was sitting next to a window watching tv. a moving light outside the west facing window caught my eye. it very nearly resembled the full moon. it was about 15 to 20 degrees west of zenith, moving from south to north (left to right) about one degree per second.

i went to the north door and into the dark backyard about 30 seconds later but saw nothing unusual. other people were in the room but were not near a west facing window; thus no other witnesses. i discussed it with the others and tried to convince them that i saw it. i was excited by the experience but did not feel fear nor any other negative reaction. i was wide awake at the time and can still remember the event. (but, i can't remember the year. i feel that it was october or november but that's only a gut feeling. i was about 15 or 16 years old: thus it was before i started drinking or trying any recreational '60's drugs.

around 1993 i had a terrifying nightmare that involved being in that town at night and looking up at a full moon about 30 degrees east of the zenith. when i awoke and recalled the dream i could not recall anything unusual about the moon's appearance nor any frightful occurances. (i have chronic depression and occasional anxiety, for which i've taken meds since, coincidentally, 1993. other than that, i've never hallucinated nor have i suffered from any other psychological symptoms.)
content.summary: Light resembling full moon passed south to north past window facing west.

content.detailedDescription: A small group of friends and i were watching a movie on july 23, 2008 when a close friend asked for a ride home.  the two of us then walked out onto my porch, as soon as we walked outside a huge red flash alluminated a small portion of the sky.  we looked at one another, at which point another large flash occured.  there was five flashes seperated by a period of about 10 seconds. at this point, we both ran into the middle of the street and were staring over a large tree across the street at the flashes. around the third of fourth flash we could see a dark area in the area of the flash. we were not certain that it was an object but it was illuminated by the flashes. after the fifth flash subsided, there was nothing to be seen in the sky, besides dark clouds. both of our reactions to this object were the same, complete shock. it was unlike anything else we had ever seen. my friends name is shakir green.
content.summary: Bright red and orange flashes in sky, followed by a dark object instantly disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
this close encounter happen outside a very small municipality of bellefeuille situated near the city of saint-j���rome, approximated 5 miles north-est of the international airport of mirabel. for the first time, i go alone there at the back of a very small camping, to see friends and my arrival was in the afternoon saturday the 16 june 1978 and i was suppose to came back in montr���al the sunday morning.


     i decide to go to sleep in the back seat of my old ambassador!!! at 02h30 a.M. but before that, i decide to smoke a last cigarette in front of my wheel. at my arrival at the camping, i park my car in front of a m���tal chain who block the access for tractor, genre john deer , to a on way road dirt of 7 feets wide to farmers or some kind of 3 tires bikes, and this one track road have tree both sides and this small road has also an angle of 30 degrees upscale, on a distance of about 75 feets where you see part of the sky, and you arrive to a kind of a upscale plateau who was in fact a sand carri���rre of 100 feets large by 150 feets deep and in less than 10 secondes by foot, you have the access of this plateau but i did not go there or heard about it since my arrival at the camping.


     i was strangely thinking about this sp���cific place was an excellent one to see a u.F.O. ( remember the film of spielberg close encounter have a big impact the summer before ) by it's location and the fact it was my first time there. i said to myself to stop to think about to see u.F.O. because when it will happening, i will know it !!! and less than one second !!! , a white flash appear in the rigth corner of my windshield !!!.



     after each three or four seconds an another flash, and so forth and each is very white, the brigthiest i ever seen in my life ( genre halogene with very high density ) and the white flash is bigger than what we can see today on planes. first,i think it was an h���lico who was going very low from the north to the south, so i get out and run quickly upstairs on this plateau realising i hear no noise !!!.



     on the plateau i was surprise to see the flash of the invisible object was coming back to the north in a pendullum kind of descent ( like a leaf who fall from a tree )and the pendullum movement go back in forth north and south for 3 or 4 minutes in this beautiful summer nigth without clouds but i don't remember see the moon.



     i most tell i was fascinated and happy and the absence of any noise  remarquable !!!. during the descent of the u.F.O. i look to my rigth and the small road was gone up 5 feets in a no specific direction because i never move until the object revealed itself when arrive near the the trees on the horizon, approximitely 250 feets.



     reveale itself because when after it seem 3 minutes of the pendulling descent and the ligth will surely disapear at this rate in less than 30 seconds, i said to myself what i will do after the invisible object will be lower than the top of the trees, the flash became a crescent of a multitude of colours, grenn - bleu - red - orange - violet, and others without now any flassing !!! it was beautiful but i start to get scare.



     after one minute to seeing this small crescent ( if i put my hand in extension it was half an inch large and the distance according to the line of trees in the horizon could be around half a mile while the pendullum descent start probably 1000 feets high, the u.F.O. was already low.



     after roughly one minute, i decide then to go " in the woods without any kind of spotligth and i make a couple of walking steps and the visitor of the darkness automatiquely get bigger 150% ( like one inch in a half with my fingers in extension !!! ) so it was an object very big, probably more than 100 feets wide and 10 feets high and than i became very unconfortable facing alone !!!!! the unknown and the u.F.O. continue his descent after i retreat 5 feets backwards and 30 seconds later it was no luminescence of the presence of the ship behind the trees so i decide to go to my car and ask my friend michel to came with me find it-them but his fiancee said you will be hijacked and disapear for ever so i decide to go in the morning there because michel said to me one of his friend go on the plateau a couple weeks before and he take the small road who go in the woods and in les then 5 minutes you arrive to an hydro - qu���bec electricity line and around 9ha.M. i go there alone and ...



     if i decide to make public for the first time, it's because since 2008 i start to listen georges lowry coast to coast a.M. and he give informations last nigth about the san - jos��� 39e m.U.F.U.N.Convention.
content.summary: Brigth white light flashing each 3 secondes with no form until it's change in a multicolours crescent

content.detailedDescription: I was in my sisters pool lounging on a float and had been watching a buzzard circling in the sky. while i was watching the buzzard, the object caught my eye.  the object was sivery white and reflective in the sun. at first i thought it was a commercial or military jet. i then realized how large the object was due to how high it was in the sky and its proximity to the clouds. it was a bright sunny day with a few billowy clouds. i have seen many airplanes of all sizes in the air over the city over the course of many years and i have never seen anything like this before. the object was moving very rapidly and in a straight trajectory. i looked for wings or anything that resembled an airplane. it was moving at an incredible speed and left my view within seconds behind the top of the trees. it took a moment for it to sink in as to what i had witnessed.
content.summary: Silver cylinder, high flying, extreme speed, very large

content.detailedDescription: I was driving into kokomo to get a bite to eat with my then girlfriend. it was approximatly 10;30 at night and it was a saturday. we were traveling west on 300 s. about 3 miles from the intersection of state road 19 and 300 s. i stopped to view two sphere shaped lights sitting completely still in the night sky. they were about a 500 feet in the sky well above the trees and powerlines. i sat and watched in amazement with my girlfriend for a period of maybe 45 seconds these lights setting still all the while saying, "do you see this to her." she did. it was like the lights noticed us there and began to play. by "play" i mean they chased one another around in a circle for over a minute. it was not scary because it was like watching a dog chase it's tail, but i can't help feeling they were doing it for our entertainment. then the spheres stopped and the sky went black again , but only for a moment. they reappeared in an arc formation turning on one at a time till there was 5 and when all 5 were lit they vanished in the same order they came on. the later events happened very quickly and was similar to the movement of a rock skipping across a pond. after all this happened we called each of our parents and told them and questioned if they had heard from the t.V. of any sightings or strange things happening. we were told by her mom to call the sheriffs department. which we did to report it and to find out any information if there was any, which there was no other reports. i live 30 minutes from grissom airbase and see planes, jets and heliocopters often at night as well as in the day. this was no aircraft known to me based on the way it moved and the fact that it seemed to notice and interact with us. though i am not on speaking terms with the girl in the car that night i know from statements made by her mom to mine that she is still puzzled by what it was we saw that night. i have looked for similar videos and pictures to what i experienced on the internet and have yet to find any.
content.summary: 2 orange lit spheres chasing each other followed by blackness then an arc of 6 orange lit spheres then nothing.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I went to the back door which was open when i looked out to the west and there were 3 round orange objects flying in formation one after the other.They were flying across the sky heading north but not going fast at a guess less than a 100m.P.H. i called my wife out and she observed them too.There was no sound emitted from them.Suddenly they veered to the west and disappeared into cloud and within seconds a plane appeared coming in the opposite direction getting ready to land at john lennon airport, the pilot of the plane must have surely seen them.I did not see the objects again.
content.summary: 3 round orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I went outside totalk on the phone and glanced over my neighbors house and a red orb thing caught me eye, i thought oh plane but it was moving too slow, and it would go up down, left right change colors strobe like a strobe light....I got my neighbor out she started watching it with me, we got a 3rd neighbor, and eventually a 4th...I would say we watched this and many more(that wernt as doninate) from around 1110-230...It was crazt, one friend got a second of it on tape
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My friends and i watched more than one object for hours that would move all directions and flash red/gree/white
